Can I see multiple endings in a single playthrough in BG3?

It is likely that players will not be able to reach multiple endings in a single playthrough of Baldur's Gate 3. The game's ending will be dictated by many key choices made throughout each story act, and each choice made in earlier acts will influence what choices you have available to you in later acts.
